activities.name: get page
activities.description: 대표 제품의 생성 기간동안 토탈 건수

source.query:
WITH v_seq AS 
 (
 	select   generate_series( '0', '513', 1  ) AS num 
 )
 select  to_char(to_date('20131229','YYYYMMDD') + interval '7 day' * a.num,'YYYYMMDD') as date, b.b_num as weekFxrtTpcd      
FROM v_seq a, (SELECT UNNEST (ARRAY['1','2'] ) AS b_num )b
;

select to_char(generate_series('2021-01-01'::date, '2022-12-31'::date, '1 days')::date,'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(generate_series('2021-01-01'::date, '2022-12-31'::date, '1 days')::date-1,'YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(generate_series('2021-01-01'::date, '2022-12-31'::date, '1 days')::date-7,'YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'garak' as market
union
select 
to_char(generate_series('2021-01-01'::date, '2022-12-31'::date, '1 days')::date,'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(generate_series('2021-01-01'::date, '2022-12-31'::date, '1 days')::date-1,'YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(generate_series('2021-01-01'::date, '2022-12-31'::date, '1 days')::date-7,'YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'yanggok' as market
order by date;

update cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_intermediary 
set 
pum_nm=trim(pum_nm)
,g_name=trim(g_name)
,u_name=trim(u_name)
,mi_p = trim(mi_p)
,ma_p=trim(ma_p)
,av_p=trim(av_p)
,pav_p=trim(pav_p)
,fluc = trim(fluc)
,d_mark = trim(d_mark)
,j_7 = trim(j_7)
,j_7_mark = trim(j_7_mark)
,date = trim(date)
,date_p = trim(date_p)
,date_p7 = trim(date_p7);

WITH v_seq AS 
 (
 	select   generate_series( '17', '27', 1  ) AS num 
 )
 select distinct to_char(to_date('20230901','YYYYMMDD') + interval '1 day' * v_seq.num,'YYYYMMDD') as date  ,
 to_char(to_date('20230901','YYYYMMDD')-1 + interval '1 day' * v_seq.num,'YYYYMMDD') as date_p,
 to_char(to_date('20230901','YYYYMMDD')-7 + interval '1 day' * v_seq.num,'YYYYMMDD') as date_p7,'1' as p_pos_gubun
FROM v_seq
union
select distinct to_char(to_date('20230901','YYYYMMDD') + interval '1 day' * v_seq.num,'YYYYMMDD') as date  ,
 to_char(to_date('20230901','YYYYMMDD')-1 + interval '1 day' * v_seq.num,'YYYYMMDD') as date_p,
 to_char(to_date('20230901','YYYYMMDD')-7 + interval '1 day' * v_seq.num,'YYYYMMDD') as date_p7,'3' as p_pos_gubun
FROM v_seq
order by date;

update cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_wholesalemarket
set 
pum_nm=trim(pum_nm)
,g_name=trim(g_name)
,u_name=trim(u_name)
,mi_p = trim(mi_p)
,ma_p=trim(ma_p)
,av_p=trim(av_p)
,fluc = trim(fluc)
,d_mark_p=trim(d_mark_p)
,d_mark_r=trim(d_mark_r)
,j_same_p=trim(j_same_p)
,j_same_r=trim(j_same_r)
,j_same_mark_p=trim(j_same_mark_p)
,j_same_mark_r=trim(j_same_mark_r)
,date = trim(date)
,date_p = trim(date_p)
,date_p7 = trim(date_p7);
